oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mahalia Jackson
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
Jackson, Mahalia, -- 1911-1972; African American women singers; Gospel musicians
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Smiling close up of a woman with hair arranged on top of her head.
Mahalia Jackson recorded and performed Thomas A. Dorsey's "Precious Lord" and was a close friend of the composer.
